items.sentence: I suspect that Tom will come to Boston in the near future.
I suspect that Tom is ready to leave on a moment's notice.
I suspect that Tom is going to be there tonight with Mary.
I suspect that Tom doesn't do that as often as he used to.
I don't think I need to tell Tom he needs to study harder.
Tom got upset when some people dumped garbage on his land.
Tom got fined for dumping garbage on the side of the road.
I'd expected Tom to say no, but to my surprise, he agreed.
Tom plans to sell his house in Boston and move to Chicago.
We don't have time to do everything that needs to be done.
